description: This project is currently set up for automated testing and iterative self-improvement. The workflow is as follows: 1) Run autotest.py to generate playthrough logs and improvement suggestions. 2) Parse and prioritize suggestions from autotest_suggestions.json. 3) Implement improvements iteratively, focusing on narrative, prompt, and system enhancements. 4) Re-run autotest.py to validate changes and repeat the cycle.
steps: Run autotest.py to perform automated playthroughs and generate suggestions.
Review and parse autotest_suggestions.json for actionable improvements.
Implement prioritized suggestions in code or prompts.
Re-run autotest.py to test the effectiveness of changes.
Repeat the cycle for continuous self-improvement.
note: This file signals that the current project directive is to use automated testing and self-improvement. Any time this workspace is opened, this workflow should be followed until the directive changes.
